adrFormatAddress: 160 Bennett Ave, New York, NY 10040-3808, USA

originalText.text: Both the office manager (Marcia) and my hygienist (Steve) were just lovely. I didn’t need too much done from Dr. Wexler, but he was very pleasant and if the quality of everyone in his office and the top notch equipment is any indication, this is a well run practice. They fit me in right away, and my whole experience was painless, pleasant, and professional. So glad they are in the neighborhood!

text.text: Both the office manager (Marcia) and my hygienist (Steve) were just lovely. I didn’t need too much done from Dr. Wexler, but he was very pleasant and if the quality of everyone in his office and the top notch equipment is any indication, this is a well run practice. They fit me in right away, and my whole experience was painless, pleasant, and professional. So glad they are in the neighborhood!

originalText.text: I'll share details at another time. For now I'll just say Dr Wexler is the best dentist I've ever been too. No exaggeration. I've had good to terrible dentists. He is communicative and honest. Does not prescribe what can be left alone for now. His practice is high tech, and he will explain what he's doing. Actually builds crowns in his office. Amazing to watch. Best of all he practices pain-free dentistry. Oh yes, and his staff is friendly and caring and excellent too. I highly recommend him.

Amazing to watch. Best of all he practices pain-free dentistry. Oh yes, and his staff is friendly and caring and excellent too. I highly recommend him.

originalText.text: Excellent dentist & staff. He was an early practitioner of a high-tech system allowing crowns to be built in the office. No pain, very calm & highly professional.

originalText.text: Very knowledgeable and up-to-date with the latest technology.

text.text: Very knowledgeable and up-to-date with the latest technology.

originalText.text: Very nice and friendly staff, doctors are amazing and so are the assistants as well. Life saver for a tremendous tooth pain. Highly recommend this place. Thank you so much for all your help.
